reviews.review: For all of its flaws, this game has constant updates, modern visuals, and many interesting features. While there may be a difficulty getting used to the game at first, the grind is well worth it in my opinion. My advice is to simply play this game for fun and to not worry about constantly "escaping" or "killing everyone" and to just play around with the game.
Игра хороша, но есть читеры на высоких рангах. А так, чтобы с друзьями поиграть игра прекрасна. Или если у вас нету с кем позависать в подвале можно поиграть одному за маньяка.

really good, it can get spooky and gory at some points but its never TO scary to enjoy.

there is too much light on most maps and the characters are too bright .... In my opinion, shouldn't there be so much light, that is, should it be a day on a horror game?
Criminals can see you very easily and simply because the character is bright, on some characters such as Nea, etc ... those with a T-shirt are too clean and bright. you can camouflage because the clothes are bright and the grass is not big to put in it.
And the game is soo good.
Very fun game!

The game is currently as of posting this review severely unbalanced, toxic overall community, and the developers openly insult their community and treat them like crap. Also, if you connect with one of the characters to your personality don't expect them to stay that way. They've already lore changed multiple characters and as of recent started converting them into different sexualities to check a diversity box and spit on who you connect with instead of making new characters to fill those boxes.

Its a game for fun, try to keep your own competitiveness in check or you will suck the fun out of it for yourself, that said, there are big plays to be made for both sides. Play with at least one person (doesnt even have to be in voice comms, although i would be lying if i said it didnt help) if you are playing survivor ( i play survivor on switch, you can play survivor on any potato), play with headphones and a functioning computer with decent mouse and keyboard for killer and especially in this role, do not sweat it, you will kill the game for yourself.

yapacağınız oyunun anasını avradını sikeyim. 3 defa güncelleme geldi. oyun hala açılmıyor. nasıl güncelleme  yapıyorsunuz da düzeltemiyorsunuz şu siyah ekran hatasını amına koyduğumun oğulları. sizden bir sikim olmaz.
This game gets my heart pumping!! I get soooo anxious when I'm being chased, but when you win, it's so fun. Great game, definitely recommend.

Very killer oriented game now. Almost impossible to win multiple games because of how overpowered the killers are. The creators make it almost impossible for survivors now, so don't get your hopes up when you just get tunneled, camped, and get hit with dodgy hit-boxes every game.
